dailyFunStuff.title: A little touch of kindness
dailyFunStuff.content:
The Sydney Morning Herald have collected a number of stories of people performing acts of kindness for others. Pictured above is John Course, a well-known DJ that livestreamed a 3 hour set from his spare room.

Check out more stories in the link below!

citation.name: 'Give a bit': the people championing a little touch of kindness - The Sydney Morning Herald
